useCase.name: Retrieve Account Search Preferences
useCase.description: User selects list of pending accounts and retrieves the search preferences for the selected account.

preconditions.precondition: User must have selected a pending account

successEndConditions.condition: Account search preferences successfully retrieved for the selected account

failureEndConditions.condition: Error occurred while retrieving account search preferences

mainSequence.step: User selects list of pending accounts
User sends request to fetch search preferences for an account
Account search preferences successfully retrieved for the selected account
